title: r/Militarystories Idiot Yells At Army Veteran And Instantly Regrets It!
description: r/Militarystories In today's episode, a bunch of army veterans were put back into basic training due to bureaucratic red tape. When these seasoned veterans go to help set up a shooting range, a bunch of drill sergeants immediately jump on the veterans and start screaming at them. Well, they picked on the wrong soldiers, because the veterans quickly establish the pecking order in hilarious fashion!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
